p: Mouse L929 fibroblast cell line was obtained from the Cell Bank of Rio de Janeiro (BCRJ) and cultured in Dulbecco's Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM), supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), 2 mM glutamine, 100 U/mL penicillin, and 100 μg/mL streptomycin and maintained at 37°C in humidified atmosphere with 5% CO 2.
